perturbation.original_text: All material submitted to Distributor will be provided by Distributor to S2K with comments or approval no later than three business days after receipt in AdLit.
perturbation.changed_text: All material submitted to Distributor will be provided by Distributor to S2K with comments or approval no later than five business days after receipt in AdLit.
perturbation.explanation: Changing the review period from three to five business days creates a conflict with the expedited review option detailed later in the same section, which implies a one-business-day turnaround is sometimes possible and creates uncertainty. Which timeline is enforceable?

perturbation.original_text: The term of this Agreement shall commence on the Effective Date and shall end on the 60th day following a written notice from one party to the other of its decision to terminate this Agreement at the end of such 60-day period or upon termination of the applicable Distribution Agreement with respect to a Fund. Termination of this Agreement as to a Fund shall not terminate this Agreement with respect to any other Fund so long as such other Fund's (or Funds', as the case may be) Distribution Agreement is effective. If this Agreement is terminated by one party, it shall terminate the entire Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: The term of this Agreement shall commence on the Effective Date and shall end on the 60th day following a written notice from one party to the other of its decision to terminate this Agreement at the end of such 60-day period or upon termination of the applicable Distribution Agreement with respect to a Fund. Termination of this Agreement as to a Fund shall not terminate this Agreement with respect to any other Fund so long as such other Fund's (or Funds', as the case may be) Distribution Agreement is effective. If this Agreement is terminated by one party regarding one Fund, it shall only terminate that part of the agreement, but the entire agreement still stands.
perturbation.explanation: This change contradicts the following original text 'If this Agreement is terminated by one party, it shall terminate the entire Agreement.' now it creates uncertainty. Which of the clauses has the priority?

perturbation.original_text: Each party to this Agreement shall obtain the other party's prior written consent before using any marketing or sales literature related to the consenting party, and shall not use the other party's names in any marketing or advertising materials without prior written consent from the consenting party.
perturbation.changed_text: Each party to this Agreement shall obtain the other party's prior written consent before using any marketing or sales literature related to the consenting party, but may use the other party's names in marketing or advertising materials with only verbal consent from the consenting party.
perturbation.explanation: The conflicting clauses cause uncertainty about the need for a written consent on using the other party's name in advertising materials. This can lead to disputes over unauthorized use of names and brands.
